snippet: A man accused of shooting two police officers in Ferguson returned to court Tuesday over a claim that the St. Louis County police used excessive force during his arrest.
abstract: Jeffrey L Williams, man accused of shooting two police officers in Ferguson, Mo, returns to court when his lawyer claims that police used excessive force during his arrest.
lead_paragraph: A man accused of shooting two police officers in Ferguson returned to court Tuesday over a claim that the St. Louis County police used excessive force during his arrest.

headline.main: Missouri: Photos Taken of Suspect in Police Shooting
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Photos Taken of Suspect in Police Shooting
